name: My Island (itch) (developer69)
description:
My island is A game where u kill to survive and live long enough to see u making a fort, in this game u can customize in a very detailed way ur character that will fight zombies and sharks and get enough loot from them for creating houses, farms, walls and u can even expand ur island so u can make a whole big city. This game is only on its beta so soon it will be added multiplayer mode so friends can visit each other islands and even donate stuff. The next month this game is gonna get published on steam too so get ur beta advantages now and enjoy My Island!!!

General Gameplay 

U spawn in a island with nothing u get stuff by trees animals and loot them with the stuff u get from them u can build stuff like axe, houses and every 10 levels u get a special rewards, max level u can reach for now is level 340 probably soon there will be added new levels and many more stuff u can do like more detailed gameplay for now it’s in his beta version.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

1. Locate the game files (usually in downloads folder) and extract it anywhere on your pc

2. Run the .exe file

3. Enjoy the game :)
